name: Five Nights at Happy Tree Friends
name_original: Five Nights at Happy Tree Friends
description:
In short, Flippy's Pizza recently opened, and when you saw these cute animals (even though you yourself are), you wanted to work there, but you did not know what evil lurks behind these animals
